posts.post_content:
I have the following available.  Please PM or email me at [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url] if interested.  All prices include delivery.  Paypal FF preferred.

Seitz Piedmont 350 - Presents EX+, Beautiful card with obvious paper loss/chipping on the bottom of the front. - $75
Camnitz Polar Bear - Solid VG - Nearly perfect centering and bold blue back. -$37
Lumley EPDG - VG - Surface wrinkles and chipping on the sides.  The back is very clean. - $95
Smith, "Happy" - Sov460 - VG/EX+ - very light crease in the upper left and surface wrinkle in the middle right keeps the card from being EX. - $90

[QUOTE][/QUOTE]
